    • Method Detail

      • getOrganisms

        public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getOrganisms(ObjectStore os,
                                                  java.lang.String type,
                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> bagContents,
                                                  boolean lowercase)
        For a bag of objects, returns a list of organisms
        Parameters:
        os - ObjectStore
        lowercase - if true, the organism names will be returned in lowercase
        bagContents - IDs of objects in bag
        type - type of bag
        Returns:
        collection of organism names

      • getOrganisms

        public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getOrganisms(ObjectStore os,
                                                  java.lang.String type,
                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> bagContentsAsIds,
                                                  boolean lowercase,
                                                  java.lang.String organismFieldName)
        For a bag of objects, returns a list of organisms.
        Parameters:
        os - ObjectStore
        lowercase - if true, the organism names will be returned in lowercase
        bagContentsAsIds - list of IDs in the bag
        organismFieldName - eg. name, shortName or taxonId
        type - type of bag
        Returns:
        collection of organism names

      • replaceStrain

        public static java.lang.Integer replaceStrain(java.lang.Integer taxonId)
        Looks in the organism repo for the taxon ID provided. If the taxon ID is not there, it looks for strains that use that ID. Will return NULL if there is no strain and no taxon ID in the organism data.
        Parameters:
        taxonId - original taxon ID
        Returns:
        taxonId for organism, not the strain
